notesStmt.note: Folios 3, 127, 128, 136, 137, 139-141 have been more or less mutilated; of folios 138 and 142 only small portions are preserved.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Japheth ben Ali ha-Levi on the book of Jeremiah.

collation.p: 15 quires of originally 10 leaves each. 3 quires are currently incomplete. Signatures in Hebrew letters on the righ-hand upper corner of the first page, now wholly or partially lost.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square script of approximately 14th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Yefet. Com. on Jeremiah. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2504.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [143v].
